column4: apt-get install build-essential, it says it has been the latest version, but compiling c++ program, it outputs some include header files can not find
build-essentials is just that. essentials. more esoteric c++ libraries are not included
but how to install  esoteric c++ libraries, it is related to the iostream header file, it can find iostream, but some file included in the iostream can not be found, such as bits/xxx.h
sounds like you're missing some other library to me. read the README and other documentation that came with the source to see what libraries you need
